title: Dell UltraSharp U2723QE 27-inch 4K USB-C Hub Monitor
description: Experience stunning 4K clarity with this 27-inch IPS monitor featuring USB-C connectivity, 95% DCI-P3 color coverage, and built-in KVM switch for seamless multi-device workflow.

title: Logitech MX Master 3S Wireless Mouse
description: Advanced wireless mouse with MagSpeed electromagnetic scrolling, 8000 DPI darkfield sensor, and multi-device connectivity. Perfect for productivity and creative work.

title: Keychron K8 Wireless Mechanical Keyboard
description: Compact 87-key wireless mechanical keyboard with hot-swappable switches, RGB backlighting, and Mac/Windows compatibility. Perfect for both gaming and productivity.

title: Sony WH-1000XM5 Wireless Noise Canceling Headphones
description: Industry-leading noise cancellation with exceptional sound quality. 30-hour battery life, multipoint connection, and crystal-clear call quality.

title: Logitech C920 HD Pro Webcam
description: Full HD 1080p video calling and recording with auto-focus and built-in dual stereo mics. Perfect for streaming, video calls, and content creation.

title: ASUS ProArt Display PA278QV 27-inch Monitor
description: Professional 27-inch WQHD monitor with 100% sRGB color gamut, hardware calibration, and factory pre-calibration for accurate colors.

title: Razer DeathAdder V3 Gaming Mouse
description: Ergonomic gaming mouse with Focus Pro 30K sensor, 90-hour battery life, and ultra-lightweight design at 59g for competitive gaming.

title: Apple Magic Keyboard with Numeric Keypad
description: Wireless keyboard with extended layout, scissor mechanism for comfortable typing, and rechargeable battery that lasts for about a month.

title: Audio-Technica ATH-M50x Professional Studio Headphones
description: Professional monitor headphones with exceptional clarity and deep, accurate bass response. Collapsible design with detachable cables.

title: Elgato Facecam 1080p60 Webcam
description: Premium webcam designed for streamers with uncompressed 1080p60 capture, advanced image sensor, and professional streaming software integration.

title: LG 34WN80C-B 34-inch UltraWide Monitor
description: 34-inch curved UltraWide QHD monitor with USB-C connectivity, HDR10 support, and 21:9 aspect ratio for immersive productivity and gaming.

title: Microsoft Surface Mouse
description: Sleek wireless mouse with precise tracking, comfortable design, and up to 12 months of battery life. Perfect companion for Surface devices.

title: Corsair K95 RGB Platinum XT Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
description: Premium gaming keyboard with Cherry MX switches, dedicated macro keys, per-key RGB lighting, and durable aluminum frame.

title: SteelSeries Arctis 7P Wireless Gaming Headset
description: Premium wireless gaming headset with lossless 2.4GHz connection, 24-hour battery life, and award-winning audio quality.

title: Razer Kiyo Pro Ultra 4K Webcam
description: Professional 4K webcam with large 1/1.2 sensor, advanced auto-focus, and superior low-light performance for content creators.

title: Samsung Odyssey G7 32-inch Curved Gaming Monitor
description: 32-inch 1440p curved gaming monitor with 240Hz refresh rate, 1ms response time, and QLED technology for vivid colors.

title: Apple Magic Mouse 2
description: Multi-touch wireless mouse with rechargeable battery and seamless gestures for Mac users. Sleek, modern design with precision tracking.

title: Das Keyboard 4 Professional Mechanical Keyboard
description: Premium mechanical keyboard with Cherry MX Brown switches, media controls, and oversized volume knob for professional use.

title: Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro Studio Headphones
description: Closed-back studio headphones with balanced sound signature, comfortable velour ear pads, and robust construction for professional use.

title: Logitech Brio 4K Ultra HD Webcam
description: Ultra HD 4K webcam with 5x digital zoom, auto-light correction, and Windows Hello facial recognition support.

title: Alienware AW3423DWF 34-inch QD-OLED Gaming Monitor
description: Revolutionary 34-inch QD-OLED ultrawide gaming monitor with infinite contrast, 165Hz refresh rate, and stunning HDR performance.

title: Logitech G Pro X Superlight Gaming Mouse
description: Ultra-lightweight wireless gaming mouse at 63g with Hero 25K sensor, 70-hour battery life, and pro-grade performance.

title: Ducky One 3 TKL Mechanical Keyboard
description: Premium tenkeyless mechanical keyboard with double-shot PBT keycaps, Cherry MX switches, and customizable RGB lighting.

title: HyperX Cloud II Wireless Gaming Headset
description: Wireless gaming headset with 7.1 surround sound, memory foam ear cushions, and 30-hour battery life for extended gaming sessions.

title: OBSBOT Tiny 4K AI-Powered Webcam
description: AI-powered 4K webcam with auto-tracking, gesture control, and professional-grade image quality for streamers and content creators.

title: BenQ PD3220U 32-inch 4K Designer Monitor
description: 32-inch 4K monitor designed for designers with 95% P3 color space, KVM switch, and USB-C docking functionality.

title: HHKB Professional Hybrid Type-S Keyboard

title: Sennheiser HD 600 Open-Back Headphones

title: Anker PowerConf C200 2K Webcam
description: Compact 2K webcam with auto-focus, noise-reducing microphones, and privacy shutter for professional video calls.
